name: AdaCare
overview:
daCare is our staff scheduling system for home care agencies. Our software does a lot more than just scheduling – AdaCare keeps track of your staff employment, licenses, work schedules, and CEU records. AdaCare manages your clients’ contact information, itineraries, route maps, and birthdays, too. We have bookkeeping tools to track hours for billing and payroll, with easy-to-read charts to measure business performance. AdaCare is the smarter software for home care agencies.

Cost

You sign up for AdaCare as a simple monthly subscription, at $69 per month per office. We don’t charge for unlimited clients, staff, or web site users, and there’s no startup fee. AdaCare is a web application, so you only need a PC or Macintosh with an Internet connection. You can unsubscribe at any time, and any unused portion of your monthly payment will be refunded.

Unlimited Support

We believe that great training makes great customers. We provide unlimited training and support as part of our regular service. For popular topics, AdaCare has on-line tutorials already built in. When you need personal assistance, support is available by email and telephone during regular business hours. We normally respond to email the same day.

Read more about AdaCare’s features and benefits at our web site, at http://AdaCare.com.
